name: Webbie's House of Humans
description:
Don't let those nasty radioactive humans bite Webbie! Web up the house and claim your territory before they get you!

Description

Webbie's House of Humans is a short and silly third-person action puzzle game in which you control a spider through a house to find spots to build webs, while two humans wander around and start chasing you on sight.

Features

  • Fully Voiced
  • Fantastic Music
  • 1 Small-Size Level
  • 2 Endings
  • 3 Minutes of Gameplay

Development

Started at Berlin Mini Jam March 2020 that took place online on its Discord server. Project files on GitHub.

Credits

  • Gab Gallard - Music and sound effects
  • Alessio - UI design and programming
  • Railbert - Spider model, animations, movement programming, level decorations
  • Iwan - Gameplay programming, level design
  • Many free store assets used for environment meshes and textures
  • Major ideas were taken from discussions on the jam discord's voice chat - not sure who the genius was behind the radioactive humans biting spiders idea - but thank you!

Controls

  • WASD movement
  • E to interact
  • ESC + ENTER to quit
  • SPACE to skip intro

DEBUG KEYS:

F11 and F12 to instantly test game win/game over
